segments.text: The little boy is standing on that wobbly stool, reaching for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks like he’s about to fall any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t watch this—it’s making me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is already tilting, and he’s not even paying attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is just standing there, waiting for a cookie like it’s no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn’t she see how dangerous this is?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I want to grab him before he falls and hurts himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water on the floor is going to make it even worse if he slips.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how careless they’re being.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to stop this before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
